description: Stories must deliver independent value as complete functional accomplishments. Balance value with testability - stories should be valuable enough to matter but small enough to deliver quickly. Not just data access or isolated operations.

do.description: Create stories that deliver independent value. Example: 'User --> loads story graph' (value: see story structure)

guidance.description: Stories must deliver measurable value independently (INVEST principle) as complete functional accomplishments - order by user journey flow, not technical sequence. Keep valuable enough to matter but small enough to test and deliver. Accomplish something meaningful with clear business/user benefit and complete flow: start → process → outcome.
example: User --> loads story graph (value: see story structure)
Developer --> edits epic name (value: update story map)
User --> generates DrawIO diagram (value: visual diagram output)
System --> initializes configuration on startup (value: system ready to use)

dont.description: Don't create stories without independent value or complete outcomes. Example: 'System --> reads all epics from diagram' (no value - what happens with the data?)

guidance.description: Don't create data access operations without purpose or value - these lack independent value and complete outcomes
example: System --> reads all epics from diagram (no value - what happens with data?)
System --> loads all features in graph epic (no outcome or benefit)
System --> serializes components to JSON (no user value)
System --> converts diagram to StoryGraph format (no benefit)

guidance.description: Don't create stories too large to deliver - maintain testability by splitting large workflows into smaller valuable stories
example: User --> manages entire order lifecycle (too large, many flows - split)
System --> processes complete checkout workflow (too large, multiple flows - split)

guidance.description: Don't order stories by technical sequence instead of user journey flow - stories should follow the user's journey, not implementation order
No value indicators to reject - these patterns indicate stories lack independent value
